Responsive Modern Portfolio

This was my first real website project. it is Fully responsive on large and small Screens.

It took me two weeks to plan, design and deploy this portfolio website. I used the following tools in the production process:

HTML 5, CSS 3, SASS, GIT, GULP, javascript

  • Client: Nature

  • Date: 10 - 10 - 1999

  • Catigory: Branding / Web Design
